title: What's wrong with the North America Servers?
body: Hello. I've been trying to connect to the game, but then the connection crapped out on me, so I restarted my computer. Then I try logging in again, and it says "can't connect". then i try to check the server status in North America and it says that the servers in North American are DOWN. WHY, RIOT GAMES!?!?! WHY ARE YOU DOING THIS TO US!?!?!?!?!?! I JUST WANT TO PLAY YOUR GAME!!!!!

replies.body: Servers should be running just fine currently.  There was a short period where some queues were down for a quick maintenance per our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  Everything should be okay, but let me know if you are still having any issues!
I have a problem during the maintenance here is the link http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/fJrWT5mX-leaverbuster-due-to-riot-bug
